getYear
Returns the year of the specified date in local time and in numeric format.
Syntax
getYear
(date)
Setting
Purpose
date
Date, from the value of which it is necessary to calculate the year.
The date can be specified as an attribute, a variable (in the algorithm), a calculated indicator or an algorithm.
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Date" tab.
As a parameter of the function, specify the date from which the year will be calculated.
Example
It is necessary to check the availability period of the limit.
To do this, the availability period end date and limit expiration date are compared.
For dates, the values of the year, month and day are compared. After comparing the values, the result of the check is determined.
